grunt.description: Executes the specified Grunt task from the specified file path alias.  Can use with or without colon-separated task arguments.

arguments.alias: (Optional) The name of the file path alias.  Will use the current target file path if not provided.
arguments.task: The name of the task plus any colon-separated task arguments

grunt.notes: Allows you to run Grunt tasks within different different code projects from the ncline command line.

gruntWithOptions.description: Executes the specified Grunt task with option flags from the specified file path alias. Can use with or without colon-separated task arguments.

arguments.alias: (Optional) The name of the file path alias.  Will use the current target file path if not provided.
arguments.task: The name of the task plus any colon-separated task arguments
arguments.optionsEnclosedInQuotes: Option flags for the task.  Must be enclosed in double-quotes.
